titleStmt.title: A short description and vindication of the true sal volatile oleosum.Of the ancients wherein 'tis prov'd the great medicine of the spirits; and consequently, an universal remedy. By T. Byfield, M.D.
titleStmt.author: Byfield, T. (Timothy)

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for R. Cumberland, at the Angel in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Royal College of Physicians,London, England.
